document_data.name: Town Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Town Hall''' of [[Helm's Hold]], formerly the '''Dragon's Gauntlet''' inn, was a public meeting place for the city's residents and its governing body.<ref name=SCAG-p85">
document_data.Location: It was located in the center of the city, not far from the [[Heartward]] marketplace and a short ways away from the [[Venturer's Rest]] inn.<ref name=SCAG-p85" />
document_data.Activities: The hall was the official statehouse for the Hold's council of Speakers, eight individuals who were elected among the city's residents.<ref name=SCAG-p85" /> It also served as a public meeting place for the non-political citizens of Helm's Hold. It was often the site of loud shouting matches that exemplified the uncompromising and individualistic nature of the populace.
document_data.History: The Dragon's Gauntlet inn was renovated as the Hold's town hall some time before the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
